Name: MPI_Type_get_extent
Description: MPI_Type_get_extent retrieves the extent (as well as the lower bound) of the MPI_datatype passed.

Parameters.Name: datatype
Parameters.Description: The MPI_datatype from which retrieve the information.

Parameters.Name: lower_bound
Parameters.Description: A pointer to the variable in which store the lower bound of the MPI_datatype passed. If the value is too large to be encoded on an MPI_Aint, it is set to MPI_UNDEFINED instead.

Parameters.Name: extent
Parameters.Description: A pointer to the variable in which store the extent of the MPI_datatype passed. If the value is too large to be encoded on an MPI_Aint, it is set to MPI_UNDEFINED instead.

Return.Description:
The error code returned from the MPI_datatype extent retrieval.
- MPI_SUCCESS: the routine successfully completed.
